title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 508.3 - Identification of persons eligible for C/THP services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 508.3 - Identification of persons eligible for C/THP services

State Regulations

Each local social services district will maintain a
system which would enable the district to monitor the status of each person
participating in the C/THP, and which would enable the district to identify
persons who are eligible to participate in the C/THP. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
508.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
